CustomField.description: Indicates if the transfer was rejected due to an improper routing issue (Out of Segment, Out of Geo, Duplicate Account)
CustomField.formula: IF(OR(TEXT(Rejection_Reason__c)="Out of Segment",TEXT(Rejection_Reason__c)="Microfleet",TEXT(Rejection_Reason__c)="Out of Geo",TEXT(Rejection_Reason__c)="Duplicate Account", TEXT(Rejection_Reason__c)="Missing Authority or Need"),TRUE,FALSE)
CustomField.label: Improper Routing
